name: Verify .kiro directory is committed
description: Ensures the .kiro directory and its contents are included in version control

onError.message:
⚠️ Warning: The .kiro directory is not tracked in version control. This directory contains important specification documents, design files, and task lists that should be committed.

Please run:
```
git add .kiro
git commit -m "Add .kiro specification files"
```

The .kiro directory should be committed to ensure:
- Specifications are versioned with the code
- Team members have access to design documents
- Task lists are synchronized across the team

notes: This hook is disabled by default. Enable it when you want to enforce .kiro directory tracking in git.
